Description.p:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, using a set of codes to describe the identified allergies or adverse reactions.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Allergy Or Adverse Reaction Ident SnCT subset with subset original id 52751000000133.
The use of this subset is Mandatory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
